name: chain wrench
description: A handmade chain wrench crafted from scraps, held together with an adjustable screw.  A leather grip prevents it from sliding.  Can be used to turn most bolts, but smaller sizes will need a proper tool.

name: mini hacksaw
description: It's a little hand-sized hacksaw made from a wooden frame and a sturdy metal blade with notches gouged out, held together with superglue.  Cute!  That said, it's quite imprecise - for most tasks, you'll need a proper tool.

name: homemade mallet
description: This mallet has been carefully carved from sturdy wood and has strong metal caps.  It serves as both a decent weapon and a passable hammer for most common tasks.
//: No hammer use action because it's a mallet and can't pull out nails

name: handyman's tackle
description: A makeshift toolbox filled with equally makeshift tools.  Fitting!

name: foiled aluminum can
description: A soda can can with a makeshift lid of aluminum foil.  It's watertight, as long as you're gentle with it.

name: macrofridge
description: A vehicle-mounted minifridge that's been enlarged with several metal sheets.  It takes more power to keep things cold, but it holds more.

name: MetalMaster forge buddy
description: From the makers of the best-selling* FOODCO kitchen buddy comes the MetalMaster forge buddy, for all your metalworking and welding needs!  It's just as clunky and awkward as the thing it's spinning off, and still requires a vehicle battery to function.

name: cooking rig
description: Skillet, pot, hotplate, and chemistry set; everything you need to cook hotcakes and heroin alike.  Includes proper fume vents and a separator, so you don't contaminate your food with toxic chemicals.

name: reinforced hand mirror
description: A small hand mirror, reinforced with a steel mesh to protect it from harm.
